amendment.description: To require that certain notifications occur whenever a query to the National Instant Criminal Background Check System reveals that a person listed in the Violent Gang and Terrorist Organization File is attempting to purchase a firearm, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2632 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2632 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S1871-1872; text: CR S1872) To require that certain notifications occur whenever a query to the National Instant Criminal Background Check System reveals that a person listed in the Violent Gang and Terrorist Organization File is attempting to purchase a firearm, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2632 proposed by Senator Lautenberg.
